cast.overview: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.
cast.title: Silence

details.biography: Michie (Michie, October 14, 1978-) is an actress from Fukuoka Prefecture. Graduated from Rikkyo University. The office went through esArtist and is now a member of DOMO. Her specialties are classical ballet, jazz dance, English conversation, tennis, and piano. In the 2005 American film "Imprint ~Bokke, Kyotee~", she made her first appearance in the film and played Komo, a girl who was subjected to terrible torture, with her body. She is mainly active in movies and commercials
details.name: Michié
